nodes.text: Head in the Clouds was a roleplaying-game adventure in the Living Force campaign. It was the first episode of the Clouds of Genarius trilogy and was written by Jason Nichols.

Recently hired scientist Shilaea Motacc was sent to the resort city of Rorkee, where she was kidnapped. The group of heroes are hired by the Usable Resource Location, Recovery, and Development Corporation to travel to Rorkee undercover as archaeology students to discover what happened to her and to rescue her. Ultimately, Motacc is discovered under the heroes' hotel and returned to Cularin.
